类型: Color: Dark Blue, Flower, 15 Inch Laptop
评论详情: I am a biology major and have used this for my chemistry and physics classes. I carry quite a bit of binders, my laptop, and other equipment, with my right shoulder being in pain from unrelated issues to the bag. This backpack does not help this problem at all, even with the straps pulled - makes me more out of breath than anything else. If you don't carry as much stuff with you or don't have shoulder issues, this backpack would work really well for you! Very durable - lasted me about a year and a half of commuting and walking around campus and I have only washed it once and it still looks amazing. Plus has a lot of rooms for pins, buttons, etc. to make it unique.
